attributes.action: Scrap all social benefits including income support, housing benefits, tax credits and job seekers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I propose that the Prime Minister scraps all benefits in this country. I believe that too much money is wasted on income support, housing benefits and job seekers. Unless there is a proper reason to which I person is unable to work there is no reason why people who just 'draw the short straw' in life or just cant be bothered to work should get free money when everyone else has to work for it and on top of that pay a huge percentage of what they earn in tax. Think of the massive amount of money the government would save including the wages of the people who have track down the benefit fraudsters.
And with this money what a huge improvement they could make to society.

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on this issue already. Please consider signing an existing petition.
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=benefits
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
